feature1.explanation: Both texts use parentheses and quotation marks.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit variation in word choice and use of specific terms.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have varying sentence lengths and complexity.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a conversational tone.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Taking an average of the individual feature scores, the overall likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderately high.
